abilities.name: Spawn Primal Locusts
abilities.description:
Launches 2 primal locusts into the fray. Primal locusts expire after 4s; speed taking priority over their lives.
**Melee** range
**Biological, Normal**

abilities.name: Spawn Swarm Locusts
abilities.description:
Spawns 2 swarm locusts to defend the hive. Swarm locusts expire after 4s; sacrificing longevity for strength.
**Melee** range
**Biological, Normal**

abilities.name: Parity Check
abilities.description:
Archive will periodically perform a system-wide check that will restore nearby allies to their rightful stature. 
Restores 24+8% shields every 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Brotherhood
abilities.description:
Defenders have been training together for centuries and know how to fight more effectively with each other
+5 damage for Defenders (max +40)
+2 damage for Sentinels (max +12)

abilities.name: Requiem
abilities.description:
The final song of the Elders. If called upon, they bestow the song of the requiem upon a lucky ally (not themselves). 
+32% attack speed and +24+16% damage

abilities.name: Suspend
abilities.description: Elite Wardens dominate any foes that threaten the Ancestor. Their powerful attack freezes enemies for <d ref="Behavior,WardenSuspend,Duration"/> seconds. Recharges over next 2 attacks.

abilities.name: Decode
abilities.description:
Analyzes the enemy allowing Ancients to attack the unit optimally.
Removes Spell Immunity and Target takes 8 spell damage each time it's hit.
Cooldown of 0.75 seconds

abilities.name: Matrix Shield
abilities.description: The encrypter weave together an impenetrable shield that blocks one attack.

abilities.name: Forcefield
abilities.description:
Magnetosphere Resonators weave a defensive wavelength into Ancient shields increasing strength and repair.
+45 shields and +1%/s shield regeneration

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description:
Matriarchs strengthen nearby Ancient shields.
+35% shields (max +140%)

abilities.name: Preservation
abilities.description:
Preservers will preserve the bioenergies of the dead converting them into a makeshift Sentinel. 
Nearby allies are resurrected as a Sentinel

abilities.name: Antimatter Shielding
abilities.description:
Enhances the Ancients shields by polarizing the wavelength for longer lasting protection.
+90 shields and +2%/s shield regeneration

abilities.name: Call to Arms
abilities.description:
Inspires nearby allies to rush into battle.

+8% movement speed (max 5 stack)
+5% attack speed (max 5 stack)

abilities.name: Restrain
abilities.description: Wardens are tasked to defend the Ancestor by restraining their foes. Their charged attack freezes enemies for <d ref="Behavior,WardenRestrain,Duration"/> seconds. Recharges over next 2 attacks.

abilities.name: Reassembly
abilities.description:
Androids have become sophisticated enough to reassemble themselves after death, but can only achieve a portion of its previous capability.

Revives after 4 seconds with <d ref="Effect,ReassemblyRegen,VitalArray[Life].ChangeFraction*100"/>% health.

abilities.name: High Intensity Beam
abilities.description:
Huge energy densities melt away enemy defenses like butter. 

-1% armor/s (-50% max)

abilities.name: Align Prisms
abilities.description:
Gradually optimizes attacks against the target; bonus is lost when switching targets.

+10% damage/s (+100% max)

abilities.name: Battlestomp
abilities.description:
The Asimov's massive size lets them rock the world. Nearby enemies cower in fear. 
25% Chance to stun enemies near the Asimov for 1 second.

abilities.name: Networked Unit
abilities.description:
Centurions are hooked up to a massive defensive network that enables them to share structural integrity.

Centurions all share the same HP pool

abilities.name: Purify
abilities.description: Purifies an allied unit, healing for 100 HP and granting 20% damage reduction for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Battle Domination
abilities.description: Uses built up energy to deal 105 spell damage to an enemy. Forces the target to attack from melee range.

abilities.name: Gravity Lance Beam
abilities.description: This highly experimental weapon pierces through enemies in a line.

abilities.name: Missile Suppression
abilities.description:
Missile Platform is capable of firing splash damaging rockets that temporary stun incoming invaders. 
0.25 Second stun.

abilities.name: Concussion Shell
abilities.description:
Pressurized sound wave shock the target and nearby enemies.

Slows targets by 10% for 3.5s (max 50%).

abilities.name: Advanced Surveillance
abilities.description:
Orbital Satellite relays advanced battlefield information to the Automatons allowing them to fight more effectively. 
Allies +1 Attack Range (Max of 3)

abilities.name: Designate Priority One Threat
abilities.description: Priority targeting identifies the strongest proximate enemy and order nearby allies to focus fire.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: The Prophet can foresee nearly all of his opponent's moves. Grants +50% evasion and a 40% chance to deal 2x damage.

abilities.name: Absolution
abilities.description: Gains +4% attack speed with every attack against the enemy (max +150% attack speed).

abilities.name: Explosive Rounds
abilities.description:
Pulverizer has temperamental explosive rounds that can damage nearby enemies. 
<d ref="Effect,APulverizerCritSet,Chance*100"/>% Chance to deal <d ref="Effect,PulverizerExplode,AreaArray[0].Fraction*100"/>% damage to <d ref="Effect,PulverizerExplode,AreaArray[0].MaxCount"/> nearby units.

abilities.name: Salvage
abilities.description:
Salvager is capable of quickly scavenging the battlefield for additional defense. 
Nearby fallen allies grant <d ref="(1-Behavior,SalvageArmor,DamageResponse.ModifyFraction)*100"/>% damage reduction (Max <d ref="(1-Behavior,SalvageArmor,DamageResponse.ModifyFraction)*100*Behavior,SalvageArmor,MaxStackCount"/>%)

abilities.name: Welding
abilities.description: Repairs damaged allies for 25 HP/s.

abilities.name: Creation
abilities.description: Each attack binds a Celestian to this Theos. Celestians so bound are released after 20s.

abilities.name: Tempt
abilities.description: Every time a unit attacks the Fallen, it has an 6% chance to become Tempted. Tempted units gain +40 Damage and take -70 HP/S. Temptation is permanent.

abilities.name: Infatuate
abilities.description: Infatuates an enemy for 3 seconds making attacks heal 20 HP. Bosses resist and inflict only 50% damage for 2 seconds. Costs 10 energy.

abilities.name: Purge
abilities.description: Purges a random enemy unit, dealing 150 damage and permanently removing spell immunity. Costs 7 energy.

abilities.name: Experimental Unit
abilities.description:
U87 Prototypes are extremely unstable machines. They have extremely high damage output, but their performance can vary. 
Unreliable components inflict 10 self-damage per attack.

abilities.name: Quark Shield
abilities.description: An advanced quark generator emits a temporal resonance field that reverts damage to nearby allies. Up to 50 damage reverted per energy.

abilities.name: Pacify
abilities.description:
Each attack reduces the target's damage by -10% and increases damage taken by 3%. Stacks up to 4x.
Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Conjure Diablo
abilities.description:
Hades summons Diablo to his side. Lasts 60 seconds.

Diablo:
1200 HP
Armored, Chaos
Raise Dead

abilities.name: Flaming Arrows
abilities.description: Using energy, flaming arrows launch into the target inflicting 20 spell damage. The target and nearby enemies suffer 3 damage/s and +5% damage from all sources for 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Skeletons move faster and regenerate hitpoints more quickly.

abilities.name: Vocant de Furor
abilities.description:
The Dark Mage can entangle the mind of an ally, increasing its attack speed by 30% for 20 seconds. Nightmare's gain +1 attacks for Counter-Attacks and Doppelganger gains +2 Attacks for Counter-Attacks 
Costs 10 energy.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Skeletons move faster and regenerate hitpoints more quickly.

abilities.name: Sticky Slime
abilities.description: The unit's attacks slow the target's movement speed by 10% and attack speed by 5% (max 3 stack; 1 per spitter).

abilities.name: Sticky Webs
abilities.description: The unit's attacks slow the target's movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 15% (max 3 stack; 1 per crawler).

abilities.name: Plasma Shields
abilities.description: This unit uses energy to block damage. All attacks over 30 damage are reduced by 75%. Consumes 2 energy per attack.

abilities.name: Energy Rage
abilities.description: With excess energy, this unit will attack furiously at the enemy, dealing an additional 40 damage for no cost. (Unit must have 10+ energy to use)

abilities.name: Water Splash
abilities.description: Attacks made by this unit splash to one other unit dealing 80% damage. Consumes 2 energy.

abilities.name: Deluge
abilities.description: This unit's attacks bounce to two other enemies dealing 80% as much damage per bounce. Consumes 2 energy.

abilities.name: Energy Catalyst
abilities.description:
The Adept can harness massive amounts of energy to increase attack speed by 400% for 2 seconds.
Consumes 10 energy.

abilities.name: Cleanse
abilities.description: Cleanses an allied unit, healing for 40 HP and granting 10% damage reduction for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.description: Raises one of your units to the heavens. Ascended units will respawn near your Security System with 40% life and 70% attack speed when they die.

abilities.name: Torment
abilities.description: The Daemon torments enemies in front of him. He projects a line of 10 pulses every 3 seconds. Each pulse can damage a unit for 40 damage.

abilities.name: Ascend
abilities.description: Raises one of your units to the heavens. Ascended units will respawn near your Security System with 40% life and 70% attack speed when they die.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Attacks made against this unit increase the attack speeds of nearby allies by 1% for 2 seconds (max 30%).

abilities.name: Spell Attunement
abilities.description: Target takes +50% spell damage (max +150%). Half as effective vs bosses. Consumes 5 energy.

abilities.name: Blue Wind
abilities.description: The Violet pulses energy at a random unit in 6 range every 0.25 seconds dealing 15 spell damage. Consumes 0.5 energy.

abilities.name: Muddled Armor
abilities.description: Attacking the Mudman covers attackers in mud slowing movement by 60% for 6 seconds. Stacks up to 3x.

abilities.name: Hardened Shell
abilities.description: The Golem has acquired a hardened shell that reduces incoming damage. For each point of energy, the Golem gains 1% damage reduction

abilities.name: Energy Burst
abilities.description: Uses excess energy to overcharge next attack for +65 damage. Consumes 3 energy.

abilities.name: Energy Burst
abilities.description: Uses excess energy to overcharge next attack for +65 damage. Consumes 3 energy.

abilities.name: Amplify Magic
abilities.description: Grants +1 energy/s to nearby allies (max +2).

abilities.name: Energy Shields
abilities.description: This unit uses energy to block damage. All attacks over 20 damage are reduced by 70%. Consumes 4 energy per attack.

abilities.name: Undying Will
abilities.description: Skeletor will absorb an attack that would kill it at a cost of 20 energy.

abilities.name: Killing Spree
abilities.description: Upon killing a unit, Skeletor gains +33% damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Vampiric Maul
abilities.description: Skeletor's attacks will steal 1% of their target's current HP and give it to itself.

abilities.name: Call of Praesidio
abilities.description: The Gateguard taunts enemies into attacking their conjured Fiend, which gains 5% damage resistance per attacker for 4 seconds (max 50%). 15s cooldown.

abilities.name: Conjure Fiend
abilities.description:
Conjure Fiend for 60 seconds:

Fiend:
185 HP
Massive, Normal

abilities.name: Conjure Fanatic
abilities.description:
Conjure Fanatic for 60 seconds:

Fanatic:
470 HP
Massive, Siege

abilities.name: Figurandum Mones
abilities.description: The Harbinger taunts enemies into attacking their conjured Fanatic, which gains 5% damage resistance per attacker for 4 seconds (max 75%). 15s cooldown.

abilities.name: Blood Thirst
abilities.description: 4 allies within 6 range gain 10% lifesteal (max +60% HP; heals after max)

abilities.name: Sound of Madness
abilities.description: 5 allies within 6 range gain 20% lifesteal (max +100% HP; heals after max)

abilities.name: Counter Attack
abilities.description:
Nightmare has a 10% chance to critically hit for an additional attack. The Nightmare is capable of quickly parrying attacks and delivering a deadly counter-attack. 
30% Chance to Attack Target Upon Hit Every 0.95s
Only counters targets within 2 range.

abilities.name: Fatality
abilities.description: Each attack has a .5% chance of causing fatal damage. Applies to Counter-Attacks.

abilities.name: Improved Counter Attack
abilities.description:
Doppelganger has an additional 10% chance to apply 3x damage. The Doppelganger is capable of quickly parrying attacks and delivering a deadly counter-attack. 
33% Chance to Attack Target Upon Hit once every 0.95s

abilities.name: Conjure Inferno
abilities.description:
The Lord of Death calls the great Inferno to aid him in battle. Lasts 60 seconds.

Inferno:
850 HP
Armored, Chaos

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Skeletons move faster and regenerate hitpoints more quickly.

abilities.name: Forbidden Fruit
abilities.description: Reflects 100% of enemy damage. Deals 300 damage to 9 nearby enemies upon death.

abilities.name: Vulture Eye
abilities.description: This unit has a 33% chance to deal 160% damage.

abilities.name: Precision
abilities.description: This unit has a 33% chance to deal 200% damage.

abilities.name: Entangle
abilities.description: Encases a unit in a plasma field for 4 seconds, halting movement and dealing 10 damage per second.

abilities.name: Afterburner
abilities.description: THUNDERBIRD's weapon has a wide spread; up to 5 nearby enemies take 50 spell damage per attack.

abilities.name: Helping Hand
abilities.description: Grants 30% movement speed to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Chrono Trigger
abilities.description: Debilitates nearby enemies, reducing movement speed by 50%.

abilities.name: Resistant Flesh
abilities.description: 30% chance to stun attackers for 1 second and reduce incoming damage by 10 + 25%

abilities.name: Natural Armor
abilities.description: 30% chance to stun attackers 1.5 seconds and reduce incoming damage by 30 + 50%

abilities.name: Sacred Blessing
abilities.description: Heals 4 nearby allies for 35 + 2% HP every 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Water of Life
abilities.description:
Heals 6 nearby allies for 35 + 2% HP every 3 seconds (on average).
Upon dying this unit will heal 5 nearby allied units for 50 + 10% HP.

abilities.name: Heavy Particle Beam
abilities.description: A solid beam of energetic particle penetrates most enemies in a line for 40% damage.

abilities.name: Twin Flamethrower
abilities.description: Twin flamethrowers inflict 50% damage to enemies near their target

abilities.name: Power Surge
abilities.description: Zeus infuses his weapon with lightning dealing an additional 65 damage for 10 energy. With each attack, Zeus gains 1 energy.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Cloud
abilities.description: When struck below 40% life, the Veteran releases a powerful Adrenaline Cloud granting nearby allies +8 damage for 10 seconds (15s recharge)

abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.description: The Captain is a commanding presence on the battlefield. All units within 8 range gain 7% attack damage (stacks with 50% diminishing return per Captain).

abilities.name: Superiority
abilities.description: The Admiral is a commanding presence on the battlefield. All units within 8 range gain 12% attack damage (stacks with 50% diminishing return per Admiral).

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Launches 3 concussive missiles dealing 100 piercing damage and slowing enemy attacks 10% for 6 seconds (4x stack).

abilities.name: Spring Of Life
abilities.description: Each time this unit is attacked, it heals allies within 5 range for 25% of the damage (up to 40 HP).

abilities.name: Font Of Life
abilities.description: Each time this unit is attacked, it heals allies within 5 range for 40% of the damage (up to 120 HP).

abilities.name: Heavy Particle Pulse
abilities.description: A pulse of energetic particles slices through enemy armor. 25% armor reduction.

abilities.name: Phase Out
abilities.description: Gives this unit a 15% chance to dodge an attack.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Deals 45 damage each second while slowing the target's attack speed by 25%. Haunt consumes 12 energy. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Catastrophe
abilities.description:
Storms an area dealing 90 damage/second and slowing enemy attacks by 50% for 8 seconds. Enemies so killed deal 70 damage to nearby enemies.
Consumes 120 shields. 12 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Violate
abilities.description: Attacks by this unit make the enemy take +20% damage from all sources. Stacks with multiple Soul of Villains

abilities.name: Traumatize
abilities.description:
Slows an enemy's attack speed by 30% and movement speed by 40% for 7 seconds.
Costs 4 energy.

abilities.name: Fadestrike
abilities.description: The Forsaken One dodges 20% of all attacks. Whenever an attack is dodged, he gains 40 extra damage on his next attack (Stacks up to 5 times).

abilities.name: Despair Aura
abilities.description: Nearby enemy units have their melee damage reduced by 15% and ranged damage reduced by 10%. Stacks at 50% diminishing returns.

abilities.name: Disturb
abilities.description:
Slows an enemy's attack speed and movement speed by 20% for 7 seconds.
Costs 4 energy.

abilities.name: Emerald Fire
abilities.description: The Dragon Aspect fires emerald-colored globules. Every third globule explodes on impact dealing 300 splash damage to nearby enemies (scales with distance from epicenter).

abilities.name: Cannibalize
abilities.description: The Greymane consumes the essence of dying allies gaining 25% of ally base HP (max +200% HP; heals after max).

abilities.name: Primal Hunger
abilities.description: Consumes essence of slain foes gaining 26% of enemy HP to max HP (max +150% HP; heals after max).

abilities.name: Poison Sac
abilities.description: This unit fires venomous sacs that poison the enemy, slowing its attack speed by 15% and movement speed by 25% for 5 seconds. Deals 3 damage per second.

abilities.name: Venom Sac
abilities.description:
This unit fires venomous sacs that poison a group of enemies, slowing their attack speeds by 25% and movement speeds by 35% for 5 seconds. Deals 11 damage per second to each unit.
Envenoms a maximum of 3 targets per attack.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: The Roach Champion and three nearby allied towers gain a 18% bonus to attack speed.

abilities.name: Circle Slash
abilities.description: This unit attacks everything around it, dealing 40% damage to a small area.

abilities.name: Deep Gash
abilities.description:
The Zergling Savage's claws are able to pierce through one enemy and deeply gashes units it attacks. Gashed unit take 10 spell damage per second, move 70% slower, and attack 50% slower.
(replaces Gash; does not stack)

abilities.name: Gash
abilities.description: The Zergling Warrior gashes units it attacks. Gashing a unit slows its movement by 50% and attack by 25%.

abilities.name: Uplink
abilities.description:
This Astromech Droid will uplink to a nearby Automaton unit. 
Adds <d ref="Behavior,Uplink,Modification.VitalMaxArray[Life]"/> Life, <d ref="Behavior,Uplink,Modification.DamageDealtScaled[Melee]"/> + <d ref="Behavior,Uplink,Modification.DamageDealtFraction[Melee]*100"/>% Damage, <d ref="Behavior,Uplink,Modification.AttackSpeedMultiplier*100-100"/>% Attack speed, <d ref="Behavior,Uplink,Modification.MoveSpeedMultiplier*100-100"/>% Movement Speed, and reduces damage taken by <d ref="(1-Behavior,Uplink,DamageResponse.ModifyFraction)*100"/>%.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Soul Flash
abilities.description: The Runeguard engraves Soul Flash on nearby allies; their souls will rupture upon death inflicting 20 damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Assembler
abilities.description: The Netherlord assembles nearby Essence souls, reducing their damage taken by 20%. (Works on all units with Soul Type: Essence)

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Enslave
abilities.description: Whenever a unit with Soul Type: Essence die near a Nethermaster, he enslaves it. This increases his own damage by 10 permanently. Only one Nethermaster can enslave each soul.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Flux
abilities.description: When a human with supernatural ability or power dies, whether witch, mage, necromancer, wizard, sage or the like, he or she becomes a Flux soul. These souls are typically more powerful than the Essence soul type.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: Fires a blast that deals 20 damage.

abilities.name: Crescent
abilities.description: Crescent hits an enemy for 200 spell damage, blinds them for 2 seconds, and blinds 3 nearby enemies for 1 second.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Flux
abilities.description: When a human with supernatural ability or power dies, whether witch, mage, necromancer, wizard, sage or the like, he or she becomes a Flux soul. These souls are typically more powerful than the Essence soul type.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Flux
abilities.description: When a human with supernatural ability or power dies, whether witch, mage, necromancer, wizard, sage or the like, he or she becomes a Flux soul. These souls are typically more powerful than the Essence soul type.

abilities.name: Blood Lift
abilities.description: If the enemy is blinded, Twisted Face steals 12 life from the enemy with every attack.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Flux
abilities.description: When a human with supernatural ability or power dies, whether witch, mage, necromancer, wizard, sage or the like, he or she becomes a Flux soul. These souls are typically more powerful than the Essence soul type.

abilities.name: Blood Fury
abilities.description: All attacks against blinded enemies grant 50% attack speed for 1 second (non-stacking) and heal for 18 life.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Girth
abilities.description: His girth cannot be ignored.

abilities.name: Throw Feast
abilities.description: Lord Kaiser throws a Feast which attacks an enemy forcing non-boss enemies to focus on the Feast. 8 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Essence
abilities.description: Essence Souls are those of ordinary humans who possessed no supernatural power.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Shade
abilities.description: Shade souls are the most powerful. Most Shades are accidentally bound to the human world from the Demon realm through a botched curse. Very few of these Shades have the power necessary to cross the divide into the Soul dimension.

abilities.name: Punishment
abilities.description:
Once a nearby enemy is below 30% health, the Scorned Hand unleashes a deadly blow, dealing 200% normal damage.

10 second cooldown (Cooldown instantly refreshed upon kill)

abilities.name: Execution
abilities.description:
Once a nearby enemy is below 40% health, the Scorned Hand unleashes a deadly blow, dealing 300% normal damage.

10 second cooldown (Cooldown instantly refreshed upon kill)

abilities.name: Soul Type: Shade
abilities.description: Shade souls are the most powerful. Most Shades are accidentally bound to the human world from the Demon realm through a botched curse. Very few of these Shades have the power necessary to cross the divide into the Soul dimension.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Shade
abilities.description: Shade souls are the most powerful. Most Shades are accidentally bound to the human world from the Demon realm through a botched curse. Very few of these Shades have the power necessary to cross the divide into the Soul dimension.

abilities.name: Feed
abilities.description: Teeter feeds on the hate of the condemned. Attack damage increases 10% per second near enemy units (max 40%). Triggers **On the Brink** after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: On the Brink
abilities.description: When triggered, attacks are 500% faster and blind victims for 1 second. All stacks of Feed are lost when this ability ends.

abilities.name: Soul Type: Shade
abilities.description: Shade souls are the most powerful. Most Shades are accidentally bound to the human world from the Demon realm through a botched curse. Very few of these Shades have the power necessary to cross the divide into the Soul dimension.

abilities.name: Ding
abilities.description: Fires three missiles at random units in his attack range: One small missile that deals 100 damage, a medium sized missile that deals 200 damage, and a large missile that deals 300 damage. One unit can get hit by multiple missiles.

abilities.name: Feed (Heisendonger)
abilities.description: Heisendonger feeds on the hate of the condemned. Each second while near enemy units, his attack damage increases by up to 10% depending on the number of nearby enemies, to a maximum of 40%. After reaching maximum damage **Ding** is triggered.

abilities.name: Vigor - Level 2
abilities.description: This unit's attack damage is increased by 20%.

abilities.name: Resolve - Level 1
abilities.description: This unit's maximum life is increased by 15%.

abilities.name: Trait - Aptitude
abilities.description: When this unit is merged with another, the resulting unit has significantly higher **movement speed** and **attack speed**.

abilities.name: Merge into Dramaturge
abilities.description:
Dramaturge is the most powerful necromancer in existence. Legend says that even if slain, its spirit has enough power to bring it back to life.
**Sylphy**
**5** range
**Light, Piercing**

abilities.name: Merge into Usher
abilities.description:
Usher bears the title of the youngest one to ever become a Reaper. He excels in every aspect except teamwork.
**Sylphy**
**4** range
**Mechanical, Piercing**

abilities.name: Merge into Staccato
abilities.description:
Staccato is the right arm of any Sylphy, his powers of assistance are unmatched.
**Sylphy**
**5** range
**Massive, Piercing**

abilities.name: Merge into Clef
abilities.description:
The cleaver is a resilient, front-line unit.
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Light, Normal**

abilities.name: Trait - Resolve
abilities.description: When this unit is merged with another, the resulting unit has significantly higher **maximum life**.

abilities.name: Merge into Soprano
abilities.description:
Soprano was once the Guardian of the Shadow Diamond, one of four treasured relics. Upon its theft, he joined the Sylphy army for a chance to redeem himself. 
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Armored, Normal**

abilities.name: Merge into Solo
abilities.description:
"Desert Wind" Solo is the most skilled swordsman alive, his apathy allows for extreme devotion to his training and merciless killing in battle.
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Armored, Magic**

abilities.name: Merge into Fortissimo
abilities.description:
Angels are entities that have the power to be anything anywhere. The Fortissimo decided to live his life amongst humans and was corrupted by them, and later on, given his title and banished for life.
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Armored, Siege**

abilities.name: Merge into Crescendo
abilities.description:
Crescendo once was a dictator of his own world, after being taken down by his own subjects and having his body pinned in place by The Great Spear, he swore nothing but revenge on them.
**Sylphy**
**5** range
**Light, Siege**

abilities.name: Aptitude - Level 3
abilities.description: This unit has 25% increased attack speed and 40% increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Vigor - Level 1
abilities.description: This unit's attack damage is increased by 15%.

abilities.name: Recovery - Level 2
abilities.description:
Heals 75% of HP over 10 seconds
Triggers at 20% HP

abilities.name: Aptitude - Level 1
abilities.description: This unit has 15% increased attack speed and 20% increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Masterpiece
abilities.description:
The traits of nearby units enhance the Composer's own strength. Each nearby Sylphy unit grants a stack of Mastery over each of its traits to the Composer. Single-trait units grant two stacks of Mastery.

Mastery can stack up to 10 times.

abilities.name: Vigor - Level 3
abilities.description: This unit's attack damage is increased by 25%.

abilities.name: Inspiration
abilities.description: The Conductor inspires up to 3 nearby units. These units gain Mastery over their traits, increasing the benefits gained.

abilities.name: Tactics - Level 3
abilities.description: This unit has a 30% chance to take half damage from each attack.

abilities.name: Resolve - Level 1
abilities.description: This unit's maximum life is increased by 15%.

abilities.name: Trait - Vigor
abilities.description: When this unit is merged with another, the resulting unit has significantly higher **damage**.

abilities.name: Merge into Staccato
abilities.description:
Staccato is the right arm of any Sylphy, his powers of assistance are unmatched.
**Sylphy**
**5** range
**Massive, Piercing**

abilities.name: Merge into Alto
abilities.description:
Alto spent his life becoming the ruler of the world. His reign was ended seven years later by his nemesis.
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Massive, Normal**

abilities.name: Merge into Allegro
abilities.description:
Allegro was a robot created to defend against the Sylphy; however, the design wasn't fully ready and the Sylphy army has adapted it for its own uses.
**Sylphy**
**5** range
**Massive, Magic**

abilities.name: Merge into Solo
abilities.description:
"Desert Wind" Solo is the most skilled swordsman alive, his apathy allows for extreme devotion to his training and merciless killing in battle.
**Sylphy**
**Melee** range
**Armored, Magic**

abilities.name: Merge into Conductor
abilities.description:
The Conductor is the right hand man of the Composer and the proxy through which the Composer controls the Sylphy.
**Sylphy**
**3** range
